subject: How to identify a JavaCore failure ?
msgSnippet: Hi , I have two problems , 1) Where my testcase is creating a JavaCore but the testcase is passing. Is there a way I can handle that situation ?. I want to
messageBody:
Hi ,

I have two problems ,

1) Where my testcase is creating a JavaCore but the
testcase is passing. Is there a way I can handle that
situation ?. I want to make that testcase fail.

2)Is there any way I can exclude some testcase from
a testsuite ?

Thanks in Advance,

Joby
